description:
Anthony is a little different from most of the models I film. I usually go for guys who are really down-to-earth and humble in a sexy sort of way.
Anthony is very immodest and he's a really big ham. But that's OK because he has a fantastically sexy, hairy body.
Plus, when it comes to stroking, it seems this boy likes someone else's hand rather than his own. Let's just say I've gotten really good at operating the camera with one hand.
title: Anthony
